channel.title: Silver Fox Blog
channel.description: A place where I share interesting findings, new projects and just random thoughts. Kinda like my Twitter feed, but without a character limit.

item.title: Textor
item.description: Today I'm releasing Textor, a plain text editor for iOS.

item.title: The Cub Programming Language & SavannaKit
item.description: Today I'm releasing two new projects ...

item.title: OpenTerm
item.description: 10 days, that's how long it took for Apple to remove my command line app named Terminal from the App Store.

item.title: Terminal for iOS
item.description: Today Iâ€™m releasing Terminal, a sandboxed command line interface, for iOS. The app is free, with no in-app purchases or ads.

item.title: Reflecting on 2017
item.description: 2017 was a crazy year for me personally. I tend to look forward in general, but reflecting on the past can help to plan and shape the future.

item.title: Pixure 3
item.description: After many months of work and teasing on Twitter, Pixure 3 is finally here.

item.title: PanelKit 2.0
item.description: With the release of Pixure 2.2 I introduced PanelKit, a UI framework that enables floating panels on iPad.

item.title: The mysterious missingLinuxMain error in Swift 4
item.description: Recently I upgraded my open source projects to Swift 4, including Lioness.

item.title: The Lioness Programming Language
item.description: For over the past 9 months, I've been working on perhaps my biggest project yet: a programming language.

item.title: Hello blog! ðŸš€
item.description: This is the first post of the Silver Fox blog, a place where I will share interesting findings, new projects and just random thoughts.
